article.description: John Simons made six 3-pointers and scored 18 points, Luke Meyer had 14 points with a career-high 13 rebounds, and Central Michigan beat Howard 72-52 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Simons hit 6 3-pointers; Central Michigan beats Howard 72-52
article.linkText: Simons hit 6 3-pointers; Central Michigan beats Howard 72-52
article.story: MOUNT PLEASANT, Mich. -- John Simons made six 3-pointers and scored 18 points, Luke Meyer had 14 points with a career-high 13 rebounds, and Central Michigan beat Howard 72-52 on Tuesday night. Rayshawn Simmons and Chris Fowler added 11 points apiece for Central Michigan (6-5). Simmons had 10 assists and Fowler added four as the Chippewas had 18 assists on 26 made field goals. Central Michigan hit 12 of 29 3-pointers to reach double-digit makes for its fifth consecutive game. Central Michigan led just 36-31 at halftime but the Chippewas made three 3-pointers, two by Simons, in the first three minutes of the second half to build a 47-31 lead. James Daniel, who entered as the nation's leading scorer with 29.3 points per game, scored 19 points for Howard (7-6). He was held to just two second-half points. The Bison were averaging 81.2 points per game.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
